channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Pope Leo wraps up his visit to Lebanon with prayers at the site of Beirut's port blast
item.description: Pope Leo XIV ended his first overseas papal trip with prayers at Beirut's devastated port and a Mass attended by 150,000 worshippers in a country desp...

item.title: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond is a technical marvel and game design nightmare
item.description: After a decade of development, Metroid Prime 4: Beyond is a beautiful but befuddling game full of misguided design decisions and annoying sidekicks.

item.title: A major winter storm is pummeling the Northeast with ice and snow

item.title: Netflix launches a mobile-friendly version of Red Dead Redemption
item.description: Players with a Netflix subscription can now download the game, which features mobile-friendly controls, including touch-screen shooting and navigation...

item.title: A list of mass killings in the United States this year
ChatGPT referrals to retailers’ apps increased 28% year-over-year, says report
item.description: ChatGPT referrals to retailers' apps were up on Black Friday year-over-year, with Walmart and Amazon benefiting the most.

item.title: Mass killings in 2025 in the US hit the lowest level since 2006
item.description: Seventeen mass killings have occurred this year in the U.S., the lowest since 2006. Experts say this probably isn’t the start of a bigger trend.

item.title: AWS launches new Nova AI models and a service that gives customers more control
item.description: Amazon Web Services announced four new AI models within its Nova model family and a frontier model service.

item.title: The spectacle of Bryan Johnson and his livestreamed shrooms trip
item.description: Bryan Johnson livestreamed his shrooms trip -- which included both Grimes and Marc Benioff -- as part of his controversial longevity research.
